description: Twisted Chill was founded by Jesse Soares & Michael Moules & Inspired by fresh living. Experience our inventive fresh gourmet local ice cream, our approach to dessert puts you in charge of your TWISTED CHILL experience. The truck serves locally made gourmet ice cream.  Try any of the flavors in a waffle cone, sugar cone, cup, or a custom made ice cream sandwich with your choice of fresh baked cookies. We also offer an amazing cold brew iced coffee made using Verve coffee roasters. Twisted Chill also offers traditional root beer and cream soda floats, all with attentive service in a friendly atmosphere. Our ECO friendly dessert truck a one of a kind experience sure to take the sweet streets by storm.
name: Twisted Chill
